Eduarda vive en casa de sus padres en un acabado de adobe y piso de cemento en la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de comerciante de frutas. Eduarda necesita el crédito para el aumento de su capital de trabajo y de esta madera mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida.
El sueño de Eduarda es poder tener una tienda propia donde poder vender sus productos ya que actualmente es ambulate.
texts.en:
Eduarda lives in her parents’ house, made of adobe with a cement floor, in the city of La Paz. She works selling fruit. Eduarda needs a loan in order to increase her working capital so that she can improve her income and quality of life.

Eduarda’s dream is to have her own store where she can sell her products as currently she is a street vendor.

loans.use: to increase her working capital in order to be able to buy fruit for her business

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 30-year-old married man. He has five children with ages ranging from three to 10 years old. He describes himself to be humorous. He operates a retail business where he supplies bread and milk to retail shops. He has been involved in this business for 15 years. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are shop owners. He will use the KES 70,000 loan to buy more stock of bread and milk and a motorcycle to help him transport the products faster. His business goal is to open a wholesale business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his fourth loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to purchase a pick-up to enable him to transport more products and serve more customers.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk and a motorcycle

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 30-year-old married man. He has two children who are two and six years old. He describes himself to be an achiever. He operates a retail business where he sells electronics. He has been involved in this business for six years. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be security. He will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of electronics. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to expand the business even further.

loans.use: to buy more stock of electronics

loans.name: Adham

texts.en:
Adham is 28 years old and lives in Gaza with his wife and one child. He sells all kinds of cereals at his stall on the street. He started this work in 2008. His living conditions prevented him from completing his higher education.

Adham is requesting this youth loan to purchase a chair and an umbrella for his stall, and a large quantity of cereals to sell. This will allow him to increase his stock and increase his income, which will help him to improve the financial conditions of his family. 
 
His dream is to expand his business and he desires to use part of the profits on his children’s education in the future. 

Adham is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase a chair, an umbrella and a large quantity of cereals

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad, a 53-year-old electrician, lives with his wife and four children in Talluza, a Palestinian village located in the northern West Bank, 15 kilometers northeast of Nablus. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics census, it had a population of 2,375 in 2007.

Ahmad has applied for a loan from  Ryada to repair the cracked walls of his house through which water is seeping in. This loan will improve the family's living conditions, thereby providing them with a psychological boost. 

Ahmad is very grateful to all who help him.

loans.use: to repair the walls of his house through which water is seeping in.

loans.name: Alaa'

texts.en: Alaa’ is 19 years old. He lives with his family in Gaza. He has a store for selling school supplies. He earns a monthly income of $419. Alaa' started his business one year ago. He needs this youth loan to buy a printer machine, shelves and new school supplies, especially because now is the school season after the winter holiday. Alaa’ is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy a printer machine, shelves and new school supplies

loans.name: Aura Nelly

texts.es:
Aura es una mujer carismática y luchadora, madre soltera de 4 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo, amor y dedicación.
Desde hace varios años, se desempeña como comerciante independiente, oficio que aprendió de manera empírica, por el método de prueba/error; los primeros productos que ofreció fueron pijamas y poco a poco sus ventas y su clientela fue aumentado y volviéndose más exigente en cuanto a la variedad de productos; es por ello que solicita el apoyo del crédito, con el fin de comprar surtido al por mayor (pijamas, camisetas, jeans, entre otros), esto le permitirá satisfacer las necesidades inmediatas de sus clientes, aumentando los ingresos que percibe con su labor.
Aura, con su espíritu emprendedor, sueña con tener un gran almacén para vender sus productos y lograr que sea más rentable, para garantizar una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aura is a charismatic and hardworking single mother who has gotten her four children ahead with great effort, love and dedication.

She has been an independent merchant for several years and learned this on her own through trial and error.  Her first products were pajamas and little by little she increased her number of customers and they became more demanding about the variety of products, so she is asking for a loan to buy items in quantity, (pajamas, t-shirts, jeans, etc.).  This way she can satisfy her immediate customer needs and increase her income.

Aura, with her entrepreneurial spirit, dreams of having a large store to sell her products and make them more profitable so she can provide a better quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 22 years old. He lives in Gaza with his family. Mohammad is the only one who is employed and helping his family in providing income.
He has a shoe stall on the street where he sells them and also distributes to other shops. He has been involved in the retail business for many years and he still needs a lot of improvement. That's why he is requesting this youth loan from Ryada to purchase more goods and a motorcycle to distribute the shoes to other shops, so he would be able to transport them faster with less effort and increase his stock, which will lead to an increase in his income and improve his financial condition. 
Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase more goods and a motorcycle to distribute the shoes

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan tiene 36 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado en la escuela, está casado y tienen 3 hijos como fruto de su matrimonio, un niño de 6 años de edad y unas pequeñas gemelas de tan solo 4 meses de edad. 
Su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, pero también trabaja en el comercio de queso fresco, pues existe una quesera cerca que se lo facilita.

Juan es un hombre de campo, ha trabajado la tierra desde temprana edad, desde que su padre lo llevaba al campo para que aprendiera. También ha trabajado como motorista de rutas de buses de la zona, sin embargo esto no lo satisface tanto económicamente, es por eso que Juan también es “pocero”, pues lo contratan para hacer pozos de 13 metros de profundidad.

Este hombre trabajador, necesita del crédito, para invertir en el terreno, en cultivos de maíz y pipián que es lo más hace. También quiere invertir una parte del dinero en comprar cerdos y tenerlos de crianza en el patio de la casa para en un futuro sacarle provecho al venderlos.

Él sueña con ir progresando y llegar a comprar un carro propio, así podría transportar el producto de sus cosechas para ir a venderlos a los diferentes lugares. Esto le facilitaría el trabajo en gran manera y le permitiría obtener mayores ganancias para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 36 and has a ninth-grade education. He is married and he and his wife have three children: a six-year-old son, and twin girls who are just four month sold. Juan's wife works in their home, but also has a job in a nearby shop that makes fresh cheese. Working close to home allows Juan's wife to earn money while still caring for her family. 

Juan is a farmer and has worked the land from a very young age. When Juan was a child, his father brought him to the fields to teach him to farm. Juan has also worked as a bus driver in his town, but that job doesn't pay enough to meet his needs. Juan therefore also digs wells, and people hire him to dig wells that are up to 13 meters deep.   

Juan is a hardworking man and needs a loan to invest in land and in the production of his two most important crops, corn and squash. He also wants to invest part of the loan funds in the purchase of pigs to raise in the courtyard next to his home. These animals would become a future source of income. 

Juan hopes to keep moving forward and purchase his own car so that he can take his crops to sell in different places. Selling crops this way would be a great help and allow Juan to earn a higher income and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to invest in land, corn and squash crops, and to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed is 42 years old and married with children. He studied only in secondary school and dropped out looking for income sources to help him stay alive. He has been selling squash (pumpkins) for many years. He started his business with a little capital, which motivated him to invest his money in selling squash. With what he had gets from his sales, he manages to pay some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy additional squash (pumpkins) to use for his business. This loan will allow him to build a good relationship with his clientele by serving their needs. He hopes to obtain better earnings and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy additional squash (pumpkins) to sell

loans.name: Al-Hashmy Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Hashmy and consists of five ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They work hard as much as they can to offer a good life to their families. They took out a loan of 230,000 YER from AMB.

Taqwa is the leader of this group. She is 42 years old, married and an uneducated woman. Her life conditions prevented her from completing her higher education. She is a housewife who wishes her children to grow up well and have a better education.

She intends to buy home appliances for her house, so she applied for a loan. This will enable her family to live in more comfort and will help her to improve her house and make it better.

She hopes to establish a retail shop in order to have a daily income and to live comfortably with her family.

She is very grateful to everyone who helps her.

loans.use: to buy home appliances for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy potatoes, flour and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Nwahd Group

texts.en:
Nwahd group consists of four women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen. They have requested a loan of 80,000 YER.

Nohad, 44 years old, is a married woman with six children. She is illiterate and lives with her husband and their children in a small house. Her husband works very hard to provide his family with everything they need, but what he earns is really not enough. Therefore, four year ago, Nohad decided to work and to help her hardworking husband. Specifically, she is a seamstress making ladies clothes.

To date, she has earned good profits and now she wants to expand her business to earn more money. As a result, she applied for a loan of 20,000 YER to buy fabrics and sewing materials to use in her business. She is very ambitious and loves her family very much. Going forward, she wants to educate her children and to improve their living standards

loans.use: to buy fabrics and sewing materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase zinc sheets, metal framing material, and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: María Marleny

texts.es:
María es una mujer pujante y emprendedora de 48 años de edad, se gana la vida trabajando como comerciante independiente vendiendo frutas y verduras de manera ambulante, en una carretilla que adecuó para la labor y con un megáfono le hace publicidad por todas las calles que transita, la idea surgió mientras realizaba un curso de capacitación en Creación y Manejo de Negocios, pues tenía la necesidad de generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
Gracias a su trayectoria, ya tiene clientes fijos y es reconocida en los diferentes barrios que visita, lo que le permite generar recursos económicos constantes.
Con el apoyo del crédito que solicita, fortalecerá su inventario, pues comprará frutas y verduras para mantener satisfecha la demanda de sus productos y mejorar las ventas, pues tendrá más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
María manifiesta que ya está cumpliendo su mayor anhelo que ha sido trabajar como independiente y manejar su propio tiempo, pues su tenacidad y pujanza le han permitido salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades que se presentan y poco a poco ha ido mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia, lo que le permite sentirse feliz.
texts.en:
María is an energetic and enterprising woman who is 48 years old. She earns her living working as an independent trader selling fruit and vegetables as a street vendor, with a pushcart adapted for the work with a megaphone, and she calls out as she passes through the streets. The idea came while she was taking a Create and Manage Your Business training course, as she needed to earn income in order to help her husband with the household expenses.

Thanks to the route she takes, she has regular customers and she is known in the various neighborhoods she visits, allowing her to generate steady financial resources. 

The loan that she is requesting will help her strengthen her inventory because she will buy fruit and vegetables in order to satisfy the demand for her products and improve sales, as she will have more variety to offer her clients.

María says that she is already fulfilling her greatest dream of working independently and managing her own time. Her tenacity and strength have permitted her to succeed despite the adversities that she has faced, and little by little she has improved the living conditions of her family, allowing her to feel happy.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Yonis Esaú

texts.es:
Yonis tiene 27 años de edad, solamente estudió hasta sexto grado, está acompañado y tienen dos hijos, de los cuales uno estudia y el otro niño tiene dos años de edad, por lo tanto solo dependen de él sus hijos y su esposa.

Él trabaja como vigilante de seguridad en un local de venta de repuestos de vehículos, tiene dos años de trabajar en esta actividad, para llegar al lugar de trabajo, debe trasladarse en transporte público y le queda a una hora de distancia, debe levantarse desde muy temprano para prepararse pues su horarios de trabajo es de 6:00 AM  a 4:00 PM.

La casa de Yonis se encuentra en muy malas condiciones, es por esta razón que necesita el crédito, para reparar el techo y porque además está incompleto, de esta manera estará garantizando que su familia viva en un hogar seguro.

A raíz de esta situación, Yonis sueña con tener una casa en mejores condiciones, que sea digna para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Yonis is 27 years old and only completed school through the sixth grade. He is in a relationship and has two children. One child is studying and the other is only two years old. His wife and children are dependent on him.

Yonis works as a security guard at a shop that sells vehicle parts. He has been at this job for two years. In order to get to work, he must utilize public transportation and travel for one hour. Therefore, he must wake up early in order to get ready for work. His schedule is from 6:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M.

Yonis' house is in very bad condition. For this reason, he needs a loan so that he can repair the roof since it is incomplete. Making an improvement will ensure that his family can live in a safe house. In light of the situation, Yonis dreams of having a house with better conditions so that he and his family can live decently.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to the roof of his house.

loans.name: Al-Marah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Marah and consists of four women who are all hard working. They live in Sana'a, Yemen. They have taken a loan of 200,000 YER. 

Shadha, 30 years old and single, has completed secondary school.  She has a strong determination to improve her standard of living. Due to the high cost of goods, she said she has a small amount of money that she collected herself. She has requested a loan of 50,000 YER to buy a laptop that will be used to do homework and reports. She hopes to improve her family.

loans.use: to buy a laptop

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer De Huitan Group

texts.es:
El señor Mario Arturo es de estado civil casado. De edad 48 años. De escolaridad 3ro. primaria. Tiene 10 hijos y de ellos 5 están estudiando. Se dedica a tejer cortes tipicos. Inició este negocio trabajando para otra persona y a la fecha lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de materiales como hilos, tela, lustrina para tejer sus cortes. Desea en el futuro contar con mas telares y tener empleados en su casa.

Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la agricultura y a tejeduria.

En la fotografía aparecen 11 integrantes pero solo a 10 de ellos se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Mario Arturo is married (civil marriage), 48 years old, and only completed the 3rd grade of primary school.  He has 10 children and 5 of them are studying in school.  He works knitting traditional skirts.  He started this business working for someone else and currently has 5 years of experience.

He is part of this group and is asking for a loan which he will use to buy supplies such as thread, fabric, and silk so he can make skirts.  In the future, he hopes to have more looms and have employees to help him in his house.

loans.use: buy knitting materials.

loans.name: Reynaldo Del Carmen

texts.es: Don Reynaldo es originario de Estelí, casado y padre de dos hijos. Tiene 48 años de edad. Es de oficio contador. Su meta próxima es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda. Solicita el crédito para mejorar las condiciones de la red sanitaria de su vivienda. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que le brindara un hogar más saludable a su familia. Su plan futuro es cancelar el crédito, y luego solicitar otro para seguir mejorando la infraestructura de su hogar.
texts.en: Reynaldo is from Estelí. He is married and has two children. Reynado is 48 years old. He works reading meters. Reynaldo's next goal is to improve the infrastructure of his home. He is requesting this loan in order to improve the conditions of the plumbing system in his home. He thinks this loan will be very helpful since it will make his home a healthier place for his family. Reynaldo's plan for the future is to pay off this loan and request another to continue improving the infrastructure of his home.

loans.use: to improve the conditions of the plumbing network in his house.

loans.name: Guallapugro  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Gullanpugro está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes viven los alrededores del cantón de Nabón, este lugar es de clima frio y tiene bellos paisajes gracias a su geografía accidentada, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo antiguo y lo moderno. Las socias al igual que toda su gente se dedica la crianza de animales, a la agricultura, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad,  son personas que luchan día a día para sacar  adelante a sus familias, aun mantienen viva su cultura y tradiciones.
Una  de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Maritza, está realizando su cuarto crédito y le gusta esta forma de créditos porque tienen la oportunidad de estar con sus amigas y pueden platicar de temas de su interés cosas que en días normales no lo hacen por sus trabajos.
La Señora Maritza tiene 23 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo es albañil y la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Maritza pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en casa pero es una mujer trabajadora se dedica al duro trabajo del campo, cultiva y la  cosecha es para la venta y también para su casa, también cría cerdos, borregos, cuyes y ganado. 
Su nuevo crédito es para la compra de cerdos, cuyes y alimento para animales y así continuar creciendo con su negocio. Su meta es agrandar el negocio de credos.
texts.en:
The communal bank Gullanpugro is made up of 7 women and 1 man who live near the Nabón canton.  This area has a cold climate and beautiful scenery thanks to the rocky geography.  It's architecture is a mix of ancient and modern.  The group members along with most of the local citizens work raising animals, farming, and in business.  Many work in the city, as well.  They work every day to support their families while keeping their culture and traditions alive.

One of the group members is Maritza, who is asking for her 4th loan.  She likes the group because she has the chance to be with her friends and talk with them about things they are interested in, which they normally don't get to do due to their jobs.

Maritza is 23 years old, is married, and has 2 children (ages 5 and 3) from her marriage.  Her first son is enrolled in a small school in her town.  Her husband is a bricklayer and they own the house that they live in.

Maritza spends most of her time at home but she is a hardworking woman who works hard in the fields planting.  The harvest is sold and also used at home.  in addition, she raises pigs, sheep, guinea pigs, and cattle.

Her latest loan is so she can buy pigs, guinea pigs, and feed for her animals.  In this way, she will continue growing her business.  Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: buy pigs, guinea pigs, and food for her animals.

loans.name: Rodo

texts.es:
Rodo vive en casa propia   en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de chofer. Rodo necesita el crédito para la refaccion de su vivienda comprara cemento, arena, fierros y otros y de esta madera mejorar la calidad de vida de el y su familia.
El sueño de Rodo en terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en: Rodo lives in his own brick house with a cement floor in the city of La Paz. He works as a driver. Rodo needs this loan to repair his home. He will buy cement, sand, metals, and wood. With these he will improve his quality of life as well as that of his family. Rodo's dream is to finish building his home.

loans.use: to repair his home.

loans.name: José Abad

texts.es:
José es un campesino de 56 años de edad, víctima del desplazamiento forzado por problemas de violencia en su pueblo natal; donde trabajaba con su padre en la agricultura pero, desde hace 14 años, luego de radicarse en la ciudad, tuvo que buscar alternativas para comenzar una nueva vida desde cero, por ello comenzó a trabajar como vendedor ambulante, pues fue la única manera de obtener recursos para subsistir.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio ya que comprará mercancía al por mayor como gorras, correas y medias, para disminuir los costos y así lograr un mayor nivel de utilidades al momento de vender los productos.
José manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es montar un almacén para vender mucha más variedad de artículos y generar oportunidades de empleo para algunos familiares que están pasando por muchas dificultades económicas; así podría mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
José is 56 years old.  He comes from the countryside, but he is a victim of forced displacement due to problems of violence in his hometown.  He used to work there in agriculture with his father, but for the past fourteen years, after relocating to the city, he has had to look for alternatives.  Beginning his life over from “zero,” he began to work as a mobile vendor, because this was the only way to get money to live on.

The loan he is requesting is a support to strengthen his business, because he will buy merchandise such as caps, belts, and stockings in bulk.  This will decrease the costs and, in this way, he can achieve a higher profit margin when he sells the products.

Jose states that his greatest longing is to put together a large store to sell a much greater variety of products and to create employment opportunities for family members who are going through financial difficulties.  In this way he would be able to improve his quality of life, as well as that of his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as caps, belts, and stockings, in bulk.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan de 27 años de edad, es bachiller y desde pequeño le llamo la atención la mecánica y es radio técnico lo cual logro cumplir una de sus metas. Actualmente vive con su padres, el papá trabaja la agricultura y su mamá los oficios domésticos. Con algunos trabajos que le logra sacar, él le ayuda a sus padres en los gastos económicos.

Juan desde que estaba estudiado el bachillerato, en los tiempos que le quedaban libres, se dedicaba a aprender  como reparar distintos electrodomésticos. Él quizo trabajar en lo que podía hacer, pero no tuvo mucha suerte así que en su casa se dedico a trabajar reparando todo lo relacionado con electricidad.

Juan utilizara el préstamo, para comprar mas herramientas que le ayudaran en su negocio de mecanica y reparación de electrodomesticos  y así poder poner un lugar con mas espacioso para  tener mesas y sillas para trabajar mejor y si sus ingresos mejoran en su negocio, él esperara ayudar mas a sus padres en los gastos del hogar.

El desea en un futuro que su negocio sea mas grande y tenerlo bien equipado, con todas las herramientas que necesita y poder a tener mas ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Juan is 27 years old, and he has a bachelor's degree.  Ever since he was little, mechanics has caught his attention.  He is a radio technician, which was one of his goals.  He currently lives with his parents.  His father works in agriculture, and his mother does the domestic chores.  With some of the jobs that he manages to get, he helps his father with the financial expenses.

Ever since he was studying for his bachelor's degree, Juan devoted himself to learning how to repair domestic appliances in his free time.  He wanted to work at what he was able to do, but he did not have much luck.  That is why he works at home repairing everything having to do with electricity.

Juan will use to loan to buy more tools that will help him in his business of mechanics and domestic appliance repair.  This way he will be able to set up a place with more space in order to have tables and chairs so that he can work better.  His income from his business will improve.  He hopes to help his parents more with the household expenses.

He hopes that his business becomes bigger in the future.  He also hopes to have it well-equipped with all of the tools that he needs.  He hopes to be able to have more income.

loans.use: to buy tools for his business.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is 42 years old. He works at the medical service center in his town. He lives with his wife and three kids in Jenin, a Palestinian city in the northern West Bank. It serves as the administrative center of the Jenin Governorate and is a major agricultural center for the surrounding towns. In 2007, the city had a population of 39,004.

Khaled wants to make his house better, so is asking Ryada for this loan to pave the walls and the ground of his house. This loan will improve the house and make it better, which will enable the family to live in it with more psychological comfort. 

The loan will help Khaled to take a step forward because he has a shortage of money. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to pave the walls and the ground of his house.

loans.name: Guillermo León

texts.es:
Guillermo es un hombre trabajador y carismático de 55 años de edad, conocido en el sector por su tenacidad y don de gentes.
Desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, inició su propio negocio como alternativa para generar ingresos y solventar los gastos del hogar; inició una pequeña tienda de abarrotes que está ubicada frente a un colegio, razón por la que sus principales clientes son los estudiantes de la institución; cuenta con el apoyo de un empleado y trabaja todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana.
Con el apoyo del crédito, Guillermo desea fortalecer su negocio, pues comprará surtido al por mayor (mecato, gaseosas, galletería y otros), esto le dará la posibilidad de ofrecer más variedad de productos para satisfacer los gustos de su clientela, dando paso para el aumento de las ventas y así mejorar los ingresos, con los cuales podrá seguir llevando el sustento a su hogar y reinvertir en su negocio para hacerlo crecer y darle aún más permanencia en el tiempo y, en un futuro tener la capacidad para disfrutar una vejez tranquila con un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a hardworking and charismatic 55 year old man.  He is known in the area for his tenacity and people skills. 

He started his own business about 10 years ago as a way to generate income and pay the household expenses.  He started a small grocery store across from a school, so his main customers are the students.  He has one employee and works daily from the early morning.

Guillermo wants to strengthen his business with the support of this loan and wants to buy inventory in quantity (pastries, soft drinks, cookies, etc.) which will provide the opportunity to offer a greater variety of products to satisfy his customer demand and help to increase his sales and income with which to support his family.  He will be able to reinvent his business, grow it, and make it more permanent.  In the future he will be able to enjoy his old age with a better wellbeing.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a 52-year-old woman from Tagbilaran City. She has two grown children. Elisa has been engaged in manicure and pedicure services in her neighborhood. She was able to make a name for herself after many years of having this as her livelihood. She is also a dressmaker. She is asking for a loan to buy nail polish, cuticle remover, nail nippers, cloth and threads.  

The income that she generates from these businesses allow her to buy healthy meals for herself and takes care of other household expenses like electricity and water. In the future, Elisa would like to invest in other business ventures to improve her status of livelihood, and at the same time save in preparation for old age.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, cuticle remover, nail nippers, cloth and threads.

loans.name: Saif

texts.en: Saif is a 30-year-old married man who lives in Sana`a. He has been operating a phone accessory business. He has ten years of experience in this business and therefore has a great deal of knowledge about the market and the demands of customers. He is a very successful entrepreneur, partly because of his shop's great location in the area. He started his business with a small amount of capital to establish phone accessories. He is the sole source of income for his family. He applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to purchase more products like phones, chargers, recharge cards for adding minutes, and to diversify the range of goods to satisfy his customers' demands.

loans.use: to purchase more products to satisfy his customers' demands.

loans.name: Julieht

texts.es:
Julieth es una joven de 22 año de edad, ella vive con los padres y los seis hermanos y abuela esta joven estudia atención integral a la primera infancia,  decidió estudiar esta carrera por que le gusta mucho enseñar y compartir con los niños esta primera etapa de la vida  para educar seres humanos con ética y valores para la sociedad.
Ella es una persona que quiere seguir preparándose para poder ser una profesional y tener una buena propuesta laboral, esta joven empezó el técnico con ayuda de los padres y abuela, ellos la apoyaron mucho  económicamente es por eso que decidió empezar el técnico y prepararse para seguir la carrera profesional aprendiendo cada día mas de esta carrera que es de dedicación y esfuerzo, es por esto que ella quiere terminar el técnico para poder conseguir un trabajo estable y así poder hacer la licenciatura en pedagogía infantil y adquirir más conocimientos para que en un futuro llegue hacer una docente.
Julieth en estos momentos no cuentan con un apoyo económico ya que los padres no le pueden colaborar por que tienen que sacar adelante a los seis hermanos y darles un techo, una alimentación y una educación, esta joven ya ingreso a segundo semestre de la carrera y desea poderla terminar, pero necesita un apoyo económico, un subsidio con kiva para poder sacar los sueños y metas adelante y poder tener el grado y culminar los estudios con un buen conocimiento.
texts.en:
Julieth, age 22, lives with her parents, her six siblings, and her grandmother.  This young woman is studying early childhood care.  She decided to study for this career because she really likes teaching and sharing with children at this stage of life.  She wants to educate the children to have ethics and values for society.

She is a person who wants to continue preparing herself in order to be a professional and to have a good job opportunity.  This young woman started her studies with help from her parents and her grandmother.  They helped her a lot financially.  That is why she decided to start her specialist education and to prepare to follow a professional career.  She is learning more about this career each day.  It requires dedication and effort.  That is why she wants to complete her specialist education in order to be able get stable work.  This way she will be able to get her degree in child pedagogy and acquire more knowledge so that she can become a teacher in the future.

Julieth does not now have financial support.  Her parents are not able to help her because they have to get her six siblings ahead and provide them with a roof over their heads, food, and education.

This young woman has started her second semester of her career studies.  She wishes to be able to finish.  However, she needs financial help.  She needs a loan from Kiva in order to get ahead with her dreams and goals, to have her degree, and to finish her studies with good knowledge.

loans.use: to pay for registration for a semester.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La señora Virginia tiene 20 años, casada ella se dedica  a  la crianza de ganado lechero y a la elaboración y venta de quesos, ella vive en la localidad de Pantini, este préstamo es primero que tiene con la institución, la señora Virginia va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado lechero mejorado para tener una mejor producción de leche,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar la producción de leche y por ende mejorar la producción de quesos, la señora Virginia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, la señora Virginia va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos y para compra de forraje para su ganado, la señora Virginia desea para su negocio crecer en la producción y venta de leche, Ella es una persona joven trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Virginia is 20 years old and married.  She raises dairy cows and makes and sells cheese.  She live in Pantini.

This is her first loan with the institution.  Virginia will use this loan to buy a better dairy cow in order to have better milk production.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to improve the milk production.  This will then improve her cheese production.

Virginia faces the challenge of improving her business and quality of life.  Virginia will use the loan to improve her income and to buy fodder for her livestock. 

Virginia hopes for her business to grow in its milk production and sales.  She is a hard-working and enterprising young person.  She has the desire to get ahead and to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fruit & vegetables to sell to customers

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Angel vive en un cuarto como cuidador de casa con sus tres hijos y su esposa  en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de chofer. Angel necesita el crédito para el mantenimiento de su herramienbta de trabajo (Vehiculo) y de esta madera mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida.
El sueño de Angel es poder reunir el suficiente dinero como para poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa
texts.en:
Angel lives with his wife and three children in a room made of brick with a cement floor in the city of La Paz. He is a caregiver and driver. 

Angel needs a loan to maintain the vehicle he uses for work and in this way improve his income and standard of living. His dream is to gather together enough money to be able to provide his children and wife with a better quality of life.

loans.use: pay for vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: La Señora Nancy sigue con la misma actividad de venta de ropa, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de edredones,  en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de ropa como chamarras al por mayor, se siente agradecida con kiva por esta oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sra. Nancy still has the same job selling clothing. She says that all went well with the previous loan that she used to buy comforters. Now she is seeking a loan to buy clothing such as jackets at wholesale prices. Nancy is grateful to Kiva for this opportunity to grow her business and also improve her standard of living.

loans.use: buy jackets

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria is married with four children. She is 61 years old and lives in Maguiles, Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur, Mindanao, Philippines. Gregoria is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. She has requested a loan to finance land preparation for the next crop season. 

Gregoria has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Gregoria hopes to have a stable, abundant life.

loans.use: To finance land preparation for her farm

loans.name: Perlacita

texts.en:
Perlacita is widowed with four children. She is 70 years old and lives in the small town of Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur, Mindanao, Philippines.

Perlacita is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 40 years. She has requested a loan to purchase farm supplies for her rice field.

Perlacita has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Perlacita hopes to have a stable, abundant life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and insecticides for her farm

loans.name: Gustavo Santos

texts.es:
Gustavo de 68 años de edad, esta casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tiene 8 hijos que son mayores de edad y que ya están casados; con él solamente viven dos los cuales viven con él y unos  nietos los cuales están a su cargo. 

Gustavo le gusta la agricultura, la cual la trabaja arduamente desde que tenia catorce años, elaborar productos orgánicos los cuales los utiliza en su cultivo de maíz y hortalizas, desde muy temprano va a dejar el ganado que tiene, porque a él le gusta mucho la ganadería después de dejar el ganado  se va  a ver la siembra de maíz que esta muy cerca de su casa. 

Con el prestamos va a preparar la tierra para sembrar nuevamente 32 hectáreas y poder sembrar pasto para alimentar al ganado y poder aumentar mas el ganado y poder compra 2 vacas que tengan criá para así con la producción de leche poder sostener a su familia.


Él desea aumentar mas la producción de ganado para tener mas producción de leche, para ayudar a sus nietos los cuales tiene a cargo y lograr superarse en un futuro.
texts.en:
Gustavo is 68 years old and married. His wife looks after the household. They have eight children, all adults and all married. However, two still live with Gustavo as well as some grandchildren whom he supports.

Gustavo enjoys his work as a farmer. He has had this job ever since he was fourteen years old. He makes organic products which he uses on his corn and vegetable crops. Early in the morning he lets out the cattle (he enjoys very much raising cattle), and then goes to his corn fields which are close to his house.

He is going to use the loan money to prepare 32 hectares of land once again so the cattle can graze there. He also wants to buy 2 more cows to raise so he will have milk for his family.

Gustavo wishes to have more livestock so he can increase production of milk. This will help the grandchildren he supports and enable him to better himself in the future.

loans.use: prepare land for his cattle to graze on, and buy more livestock including two milk cows

loans.name: Divino Niño Group

texts.es:
Janeth, tiene 25 años de edad, forma parte del grupo "Divino Niño" recientemente formado con seis integrantes, unidos bajo un mismo fin que es sacar adelante sus negocios, mediante el aumento de capital.
Janeth, se dedica desde hace tres años atender su taller de confecciones, éste está ubicado en un espacio habilitado en su domicilio. Ella recibe el apoyo de su esposo quien le ayuda a cumplir son con los pedidos.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirán en la compra de materiales como hijos, agujas de maquinas de coser y mantenimiento de las mismas.
texts.en:
Janeth is 25 years old and is part of the group “Divino Niño” (Divine Child), which was recently established with six members. They joined together with the same goal of advancing their businesses by increasing their capital.

For the past three years, Janeth has operated a sewing workshop located in a renovated space in her home. She receives assistance from her husband, who helps her with completing orders. The loan she received will be invested in the purchase of materials, such as thread and sewing machine needles. She will also pay for the maintenance of her machines.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and pay for the maintenance of her sewing machines.

loans.name: Willy

texts.es:
Willy realiza la instalación de pernos de fijación, aparatos electrónicos o mecánicos para asegurar los vehículos, comercios, casas y otras propiedades privadas. También puede modificar o corregir los dispositivos como un bloqueo de regeneración de claves, duplicados de las tarjetas o claves y generar cartas nuevas para las cerraduras cuyas llaves se han perdido con un acabado profesional y de calidad.

El vive en casa de sus padres ubicado en La Paz, aproximadamente.

El sueño de Willy Moises, realizar la prestación de su servicio en toda la región  y a nivel nacional, haciendo cada vez más competitivos sus productos y servicios, con base en la inversión constante, estándares de calidad e innovación tecnológica. Asi mejoar sus ingresos y calidad de vida.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera  vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Willy performs the installation of lag bolts and electronic or mechanical apparatuses to secure vehicles, businesses, homes, and other private properties. He can also modify or correct devices like a lock rekey, card or key duplication, and generate new cards for locks whose keys have been lost, with a professional and quality finishing touch.

He lives in his parents’ home, located in La Paz, approximately.

Willy Moises’s dream is to realize the benefits of his service in the entire region and at a national level, making his products and services more and more competitive, based on constant investment, quality standards, and technological innovation, thus improving his income and quality of life.

This is the first time that he is requesting a loan with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to increase capital for his electronics installation business.

loans.name: María Hortencia

texts.es:
María tiene 50 años de edad, solo estudio primer grado de educacion basica, esta acompañada su esposo trabaja junto con ella en una cooperativa cafetalera, son padres de tres hijos la primera de sus hijos ya esta casada pero vive aún con ellos el otro muchacho de 17 años no estudia, él siempre se ha dedicado a trabajar para poder ayudar a sustentar la familia, su otra hermanita de 15 años estudia el noveno grado de educacion basica.

María aparte de trabajar en la recoleccion de café en la temporada, tambien es ama de casa, en tiempo agricola junto a su esposo siembran granos básicos para el consumo del hogar la hija que ya esta casada tiene una pequeña tiendita con su esposo y tambien colaboran en la economia del hogar.

Parte del financiamiento que obtendra de CREDICAMPO, lo utilizara para el pago de una deuda que tiene pendiente con CREDICAMPO y la otra parte sera para comprar insumos agricolas para ya tenerlos listos para la temporada agricola.

En el futuro, ella dice que quiere ampliar la tienda de su hija para generar mayores ingresos a la familia y seguir trabajando con los creditos que CREDICAMPO le otorga, ya que le gusta la forma de pago que ella adquiere en cada prestamo.
texts.en:
Maria is 50, she only studied 1st grade, has a husband that works with her in the coffee co-operative, they have three children of whom the oldest is married but still lives at home with them, a 17-year-old that doesn't study because he has always worked to help them support the family and a 15-year-old girl that is in 9th grade.

Besides working in the seasonal coffee plantation, she is also a housewife, during the season her and her husband grow basic grains for personal consumption, their married daughter has a small store with her husband and they also help in the economy of their home.

Part of the loan that she will obtain from CREDICAMPO will be used to pay for a pending loan with CREDICAMPO and the rest will be used to buy agricultural products and have them ready for the season.

In the future, she wants to expand her daughter's store to generate more income for the family and wants to continue working with the loans of CREDICAMPO because she likes the format of the loans she gets.

loans.use: to pay debt and the rest to buy agri-products

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis, vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de La Paz, trabaja com chofer en transporte libre con su propio auto que se compro a credito.

El credito que solicita es para reparar su movilidad ya que sufrio un choque recientemente, el auto es su unica herramientade trabajo con la cual genera sus ingresos para su manutencion ya que el cubre todos sus gastos.
 
El sueño de Luis es ser profesional.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his parents in the city of La Paz, he works as an independent driver in his own car that he bought through a loan.

The loan he requests is to repair his vehicle as he was in a collision recently, the car is his work equipment with which he generates income for his own support and covers all his expenses.

His dream is to became a professional.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase materials to make repairs.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepcion vive en de casa de sus padres en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de comerciante y su esposo es transportista. Necesitan el crédito para la compra de llantas de su herramienta de trabajo y de esta madera mejorar su ingresos.
El sueño de Concepcion es tener casa propia.
texts.en: Concepcion lives in her parents’ finished home of brick with a cement floor in the city of La Paz. She is a shopkeeper and her husband is a driver. They need the loan in order to purchase tyres for his work and in this way improve their income. Concepcion’s dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy tyres for her husband's vehicle

loans.name: Angel Leonidas

texts.es: El Sr. Ángel tiene 26 años sigue con el servicio de servicio de amplificación cuenta que le fue bien con los anteriores créditos ya que está creciendo y mejorando su amplificación y esto le permite tener más contratos para amenizar distintas actividades sociales,  El Sr. Ángel va a usar este préstamo para compra de amplificadores para su negocio, ya que constantemente tiene que actualizar sus equipos para brindar un mejor servicio.
texts.en: Ángel is 26 and continues to provide an amplifier service. He tells us that his previous loans went well. His business is growing and improving, and this is allowing him to have more contracts to liven up various social activities. Ángel will use this loan to purchase amplifiers for his business, since he always has to keep his equipment up to date in order to provide a better service.

loans.use: To buy amplifiers.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
LUCIO es casado y tiene ocho hijos los cuales son todos independientes, viven en casa propia ocupando cuatro habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente percibe una renta de jubilación y también trabaja prestando servicio de comida en un club de bridge, por mas de ocho horas al día y con los pocos ingresos que tiene debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios de el y de su esposa.
El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en el pago de mano de obra para la construcción de su vivienda ya que desea tener mas comodidad y seguridad.
El sueño de lucio es concluir con la construcción de su vivienda y poner negocios o tiendas para mejorar sus ingresos ya que el es de la tercera edad y el trabajo que realiza actualmente es muy agotador, es por eso que desea tener un negocio en su misma vivienda.
texts.en: Lucio is married and has 8 independent children. He lives in his own home, occupying four rooms. The home is in El Alto. He receives a pension and also works, providing food services at a bridge club. He works over eight hours a day and uses his meagre income to cover his and his wife's food costs and bills. He will invest this loan in paying labourers to work on his home, because he wants to have more comfort and security. His dream is to finish construction and open businesses or stores in order to improve his income; this is his old age, and his current work is very demanding. For this reason, he wants to have a business in his own home.

loans.use: to improve and expand his four-room home

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es una señora de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta el tercer grado de educacion básica, es casada su esposo se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas, su familia esta conformada por cinco hijos, tres de ellos estudian los otros dos se dedican a ayudar a su papá al cultivo de hortalizas.

Ellos tienen una parcela de hortalizas desde hace cuatro años se dedican a este negocio, ellos aprendieron este oficio ya que la necesidad que atravezaba su familia era grande y aparte de eso ellos siembran maiz y frijol para el consumo del hogar.

El financiamiento sera utilizado para ampliar un poco mas la hortaliza ya que en la temporada pasada, les fui bien y no se dio a basto con las hortalizas y para la compra de insumos agricolas porque se acerca la temporada agricola.
En el futuro ella desea comprarse un carrito, ya que la mercaderia la tienen que andar en la espalda a la hora de las entregas.
texts.en:
Antonia is a 36-year-old woman. She studied up to the third grade of primary school. She is married and her husband makes a living by growing vegetables. Her family is made up of five sons, three of whom are studying. The other two help their father grow vegetables.

They have had a parcel of land and have been growing vegetables for four years. They learnt this trade out of necessity because her family was large. They also plant corn and beans for the consumption of their own household.

The loan will be used to expand their crops, since it went well for them in the last season and they weren’t able to keep up, and to purchase farming supplies as the farming season is approaching.

In the future Antonia wants to buy a cart, since at the moment they have to deliver their merchandise by walking and carrying it on their backs.

loans.use: to expand her vegetable crops, since the last season went well, and purchase farming supplies as planting season is approaching

loans.name: Adji Aida

texts.fr: Adja AIDA est une femme mariée et mère de famille qui évolue dans la couture. Elle a débuté sur fonds propres issus de ses épargnes ; elle a une expérience de plus de 2 ans dans son activité. ADJA a ouvert un atelier à coté de chez elle et travaille sur commande. Elle sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 200.000F pour acheter des tissus et garnitures pour la confection de ses commandes. Elle commence sa journée à 10h pour la terminer à 21h. Ses charges sont le paiement des tailleurs et ses besoins particuliers. Elle voudrait ouvrir un autre atelier plus grand afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de la vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Adja Aida is a married woman and a mother. She works in the sewing business. She started off with her own funds from her savings. She has two years of experience in this activity. Adja opened a workshop close to her home and she works on order.

She is requesting a 200,000Francs CFA loan to buy fabric and sewing notions to make her orders. She starts her day at 10 am and finishes at 9 pm. Her expenses are the tailors and her own needs.

She would like to open another larger workshop in order to increase her income and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabric and sewing notions to make her orders

loans.name: Marième

texts.fr: Marieme est une femme mariée et mère de famille. Elle évolue dans la commercialisation des tissus légers appelés « Meulfeux » qui sont très prisés dans la période de l’été par les femmes de sa commune. Elle a comme charges particulières les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter des tissus et produits cosmétiques qu’elle revend à ses clients. Elle a une expérience de plus 10 ans et n’a pas d’horaires fixes  pour son travail. A l’avenir elle voudrait épargner plus d’argent pour pouvoir ouvrir un autre boutique et augmenter sa production afin de satisfaire ses clients.
texts.en:
Marieme is a married woman and a mother. She sells light fabrics called “Meulfeux” that are very much appreciated during the summer by the women of her community. Her specific expenses are the education of her children.

She is requesting this loan to buy fabric and cosmetic products that she resells to her clients. She has over ten years of experience and does not have a fix schedule for her work. In the future she would like to save more money to be able to open another shop and increase her production to better meet her customers’ demand.

loans.use: to buy and resell fabrics and cosmetic products

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es: Doña Ángela es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa interior variada. Se siente agradecida con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que ha logrado abastecer la demanda de sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias.  Solicita el crédito para comprar ropa interior de mujer y varón variada. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para aprovechar la temporada escolar y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Ángela is originally from the city of Granada. She is a saleswoman by trade, making a living selling varied underwear. She feels grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito, since she has been able to stock enough to meet the demand of her clients and obtain better earnings. She is requesting the loan in order to buy varied men´s and women´s underwear. She believes that the loan will help her to take advantage of the school season and obtain better earnings.

loans.use: to buy varied men´s and women´s underwear

loans.name: Sebastiana's Group

texts.es:
La señora Sebastiana esta casada. Cuenta con 36 años de edad. De escolaridad Primaria Completa. Tiene 3 hijos y los 3 estan estudiando. Ella se dedica al comercio, específicamente a la venta de telas para cortinas. Inició este negocio vendiendo telas y luego se dedicó a la venta de telas especialemte para cortinas y a la fecha lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para ampliar su capital de trabajo comprando telas por mayor. En el futuro desea contar con más capital para poder vender por mayor y asi obtener mejores ganancias.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a artesanía, comercio y agropecuario.
texts.en:
Sebastiana, 36, is married, completed primary school, and has three children who are studying. She makes a living in sales, specifically selling curtain fabric. She started this business selling fabric, and then she began making a living selling fabric specifically made for curtains, and now she has three years of experience in this.

She organized a group and is requesting a loan that will be used to increase her working capital and purchase wholesale fabric. In the future she hopes to have more capital in order to sell wholesale, and that way, obtain better profits. 

The other members of the group make a living in craftware, sales and agriculture.

loans.use: to buy curtain fabric

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocio, es una joven emprendedora estudiante de ultimo semestre de administración de empresas en la Corporación Universitaria Minuto de dios, ademas de esto se encuentra iniciando un técnico en cosmetologia y estética integral en Campo alto.
El propósito es combinar las dos pasiones como lo es emprender, planear, dirigir y controlar todos los contextos estéticos de un spa o centro de estética, el cual es el gran objetivo a futuro, por ello emplea todo el tiempo y esfuerzo en los dos estudios junto con el  trabajo laboral actual para así llevar acabo el  proyecto de vida, ya que ella se encuentra estudiando dos carreras al tiempo los gastos económicos son bastantes altos a si que para ella es de buen beneficio tener le convenio de kiva ya que le ayudaría con una parte de la segunda carrera técnica que se encuentra estudiando.
texts.en:
Rocio is a young student entrepreneur in her last semester of a Business Administration degree and is part of the university communal bank "Minuto de Dios" or "Minute of God."  She is also currently pursuing a technical degree in cosmetology and aesthetics in Campo Alto.  

Her goal is to combine her two passions via starting, planning, directing and managing all the aesthetic aspects of a Spa and Beauty Center.  That is her great future goal.  To reach that goal she employs all of her energy in her studies along with her work so that she can bring the project to life.  Since she is studying two careers her educational expenses are quite high.  Thus, for her it is of great benefit to have Kiva since it will help her pursue her second technical career.

loans.use: To pay for a semester of schooling.

loans.name: María Candelaria

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Auxiliadora se reúne en La parroquia Sequita  en Montecristi, La Sequita es una parroquia donde sus habitantes son gente honesta que solo saben trabajar y dedicarse a sus familias.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación  tiene 4 hijos de 18, 17, 15 y 13 años, los menores estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña María  es una gran madre y esposa que realiza los créditos para ayudarle a su marido,  él se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres en su localidad y lugares cercanos. Trabaja todos los días, compra sus productos en Portoviejo o en Manta en los mercados de mayoristas y los vende a sus clientes. Lleva más de 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual saca adelante a su familia. 
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que es como ella puede ayudar a su marido para que el pueda seguir en su negocio y con el fruto de su trabajo darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este crédito es para  comprar frutas y legumbres. Lleva más de 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por las facilidades para realizar los créditos.  Sus sueños son seguir adelante y que nunca les falte nada a su familia.
texts.en:
The "María Auxiliadora" communal bank meets in the Sequita parish in Montecristi. La Sequita is a parish whose inhabitants are honest people who only know how to work and dedicate themselves to their families. María, 35, lives here. She is married and with her husband has four children, ages 18, 17, 15 and 13. The younger ones are studying in secondary school. Her husband is a salesman.

María is a great mother and wife who takes out loans to help her husband. He makes a living selling fruit and vegetables in their area and the areas close by. He works every day, buying his products in Portoviejo or Manta in the wholesale markets and selling them to his clients. He has been doing this for more than 20 years, and with it, getting his family ahead.

She is requesting another loan since this is a way in which she can help her husband continue with his business, and with the fruits of his labor, give their children what they need. This loan is for the purchase of fruit and vegetables. She has been in the Grupo de Crédito (Credit Group) for more than four years, and she likes it due to the ease of taking out loans. Her dreams are to get ahead, and that her family will never be in need of anything.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es: Doña Blanca es originaria El Rama, soltera y madre de tres hijos, dos de ellos ya independientes. Tiene 42 años de edad. Es de oficio modista, se dedica a la elaboración de vestidos de niña y manteles decorados. Inicio su negocio con la experiencia que había obtenido cuando le ayudaba a su mama y poco a poco fue comprando los materiales necesarios para poner su propio negocio. Su meta próxima es aumentar su clientela. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Lino y Dacron al por mayor. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá incrementar la venta de sus productos. Su plan futuro es comprar otra máquina de coser para aumentar la venta de sus productos.
texts.en:
Blanca is originally from El Rama, and is the single mother of three children, two of whom are already independent. She is 42 years old, and is a stylist by profession. She makes a living making girls´ dresses and decorative tablecloths. She started her business with the experience she had obtained when she helped her mother, bit-by-bit beginning to buy the materials necessary to put up her own business. Her next goal is to increase her clientele. 

She is requesting the loan to purchase linen and polyester wholesale. She thinks the loan will help her to increase the sales of her products. Her future plan is to buy another sewing machine to increase the sales of her products.

loans.use: to buy polyester and linen wholesale

loans.name: Barbara Rocio

texts.es:
Ella es Bárbara, reside en la ciudad de Bogotá, se desempeña como Auxiliar de Servicios Generales en una entidad del Distrito. 
Es una mujer trabajadora, independiente, madre soltera cabeza de familia, se encuentra cumpliendo uno de los sueños que es ser cosmetóloga, ya que ella trabajo en un centro de estética por 4 años y desde ahí quedo enamorada de esta profesión y en el futuro se ve trabajando en el propio centro de estética y cosmetología. 
Para eso realiza los estudios en Campo alto, realizo ya el primer semestre, sacando excelentes calificaciones, pero debido al aumento que se le genero para el segundo semestre en la matrícula y pensiones, ve muy difícil continuar con los estudios, es por eso que se encuentra pidiendo el subsidio de kiva, para que a si pueda terminar el semestre y cumplir una de las grandes pasiones.
texts.en: This is Barbara who lives in the city of Bogotá. She works as a General Services Assistant in an organization in the district. She is an independent, hardworking woman who is a single mother head of household. You find her fulfilling one of her dreams, which is to become a cosmetologist.  She once worked in an aesthetic center for four years, an experience that.left her enamored of the profession. In the future she sees herself working in her own cosmetology and aesthetics center. That is why she is studying at Campo Alto. She has finished her first semester and earned excellent grades, however due to the increase in tuition and fees for the second semester, she is finding it very difficult to continue with her studies. Consequently she is requesting a grant from Kiva so that she can finish the semester and fulfill one of her greatest passions.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition

loans.name: Neida Soledad

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Auxiliadora se reúne en La parroquia Sequita en Montecristi, La Sequita es una parroquia donde sus habitantes son gente honesta que solo saben trabajar y dedicarse a sus familias.
En este lugar vive la señora Neida, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos viven cerca de su casa pero independientemente. El  esposo se dedica a la agricultura. 
Doña Neida se dedica a la cría de  pollos y chanchos, los mismos que compran pequeños y que  tiene por espacio de tres a cuatro meses o  hasta que tengan un peso adecuado y luego los  vende a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa para trasladarlos a otras ciudades. Ella también realiza el crédito para el esposo el cual en época de invierno siembra maíz y maní y necesita de los créditos para comprar fertilizantes que le permitan tener una buena cosecha.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que necesita para su marido lo utilice para los cultivos,  ella utilizo sus ganancias para comprar alimentos parta su casa y medicinas ya que su marido estuvo enfermo y con sus ganancias salieron adelante. Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar alimentos y medicinas para pollos y chanchos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y  le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos.  Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en: The "María Auxiliadora" communal bank meets in the parish of La Sequita in Montecristi. La Sequita is a parish with honest people who only know how to work and dedicate themselves to their families. This is where Neida lives. She is 67 years old, married, and from this relationship has four grown children, two of whom live nearby but are independent. Her husband works in agriculture. Neida works raising chickens and pigs, which she buys when they are small and has for three or four months or until they reach an adequate weight; then she sells them to buyers who come to her home to take them to other cities. Neida also uses this loan for her husband who, in the wintertime, plants corn and peanuts and needs the loans to buy fertilizers that let him have a good harvest. Neida is repeating the loan since she needs her husband to use it for planting. She uses his earnings to buy food for their home, and medicines since her husband was sick and with his earnings they were able to get by. This loan will allow her to buy feed and medicine for chickens and pigs, and fertilizers for the plants. She has been with the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it for the support that the loans offer her. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, and feed and medicine for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Katiuska

texts.es:
Katiuska es una persona emprendedora que creció en una familia humilde, es trabajadora, y madre de una niña, escogió  el área de enfermería porque se siente en la capacidad de aprender y brindar  lo mejor de sí al practicar esta profesión.
Quiere acceder al convenio de KIVA ya que el trabajo no es muy rentable económicamente y no le alcanza para los gastos personales, familiares y educativos.
Le gustaría que CAMPO ALTO con KIVA  le brinde ese beneficio para poder continuar con los estudios en tan prestigiosa institución.
texts.en: Katiuska is an entrepreneurial person who grew up in a humble family. She is the hard-working mother of one daughter. She chose the area of nursing because she feels capable of learning and offering the best of herself in practicing this profession. She wants to access a Kiva loan because her work is not very financially profitable and she does not make enough to cover her personal, family, and educational expenses. She would like Campo Alto and Kiva to provide her this benefit so she can continue with her studies in such a prestigious institution.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition

loans.name: Blanca Bertha

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito María Auxiliadora se reúne en La parroquia La Sequita en Montecristi prospero cantón manabita, conocido como la cuna  del viejo luchador Eloy Alfaro. Y por los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla que son apreciados dentro y fuera del país.
En este lugar vive la señora Blanca, tiene 81 años de edad, hace muchos años su esposo falleció y quedo sola pero de esa relación tuvo 5 hijos mayores de edad. Uno de sus hijos aun vive con ella.
Doña Blanca para obtener algo para sus gastos se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja los sábados y domingos en las ventas y cobranzas ya que deja a crédito y cobra al mismo tiempo que realiza sus ventas. La mercadería se va a comprar un hijo a Guayaquil porque allá se encuentran mayor variedad y a más bajos costos para que le quede mejores  ganancias. Lleva más de 18 años que se dedica a esta actividad y aun se mantiene ya que tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren
Este crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas y ropa de niños. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el principio y le gusta por los beneficios adicionales que brinda la institución. Sus sueños son tener salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The communal bank María Auxiliadora meets in the parish of La Sequita, located in the prosperous canton of Montecristi in the province of Manabí. This area is known as the birthplace of the “Old Warrior”, Eloy Alfaro, as well as for its famous toquilla straw hats (or Panama hats), which are appreciated both inside and outside the country. In this place lives Blanca, who is 81 years old. Her husband passed away many years ago, leaving her alone, but she has five adult children from her marriage. One of her children lives with her.

To make some money for her expenses, Blanca works selling all kinds of clothing door-to-door. She works Saturdays and Sundays at both sales and collections, because she sells on credit and she collects payments at the same time she goes around making sales. One of her sons goes to buy her merchandise for her in Guayaquil, because there is a greater variety of clothing there and at lower prices, which allows Blanca to earn better profits. She now has 18 years of experience in this business and is still doing well, because she has many customers who prefer her.

Blanca is requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses and children’s clothing. She has been in the communal bank since its beginning, and she likes it for the additional profit it enables her to earn. Her dream is to have good health so that she can continue with her life.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses and children’s clothing.

loans.name: Bayardo De Jesus

texts.es: Don Bayardo es originario de la ciudad de Granada, casado y padre de un hijo. Tiene 47 años de edad. Se siente agradecido con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que ha logrado sacar adelante su negocio y diversificar sus productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Arroz, Azúcar, Aceite y útiles escolares. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para lograr satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Don Bayardo is a native of the city of Granada. He is married with one child and is 47 years old. He is grateful to KIVA and MiCrédito since he has achieved moving forward with his business and diversifying his product. He is requesting the loan in order to purchase rice, sugar, oil and school supplies. He gauges that this loan will greatly help him with satisfying the demand of his customers and obtaining higher earnings.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil and school supplies.

loans.name: Carol

texts.en:
Carol is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She acquired a PHP 20,000 loan and she used it to buy ingredients of bean curd pudding. Her loan helped not just in her business but also in the education of her children. She and her partner are working hard to provide for their everyday needs. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy ingredients for bean curd pudding. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Carol dreams that her business will last longer and hopes to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, and there she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the ingredients of bean curd pudding.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en: Estelita started selling bananas three years ago. Then she realized that she could earn more income by opening another business. Now, she has a variety store in front of her house. To increase her income, Estelita has requested a loan of PHP 16,000 to buy more bananas, soft drinks, biscuits, and spices. In the future, she dreams of saving enough profits for her business and for her family as well.

loans.use: to buy more bananas, drinks, biscuits, and spices to sell

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en: Analyn is 34 years old, married, and blessed with four children. She owns and manages a variety store business where she sells groceries in her village. She is glad that she can earn a daily income of 400 PHP. She would like to improve her business by asking for additional capital of 10,000 PHP to purchase bread, vinegar, fish paste, oil, and soft drinks to sell. She hopes that her requested loan will be granted so that she can continue to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase bread, vinegar, fish paste, oil, and soft drinks for her general store

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.en:
Apolinaria is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy spare parts for her jeepney and she had her jeepney well maintained. Her income from the business is helping with their everyday household expenditures. She continues to work hard for her everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and maintain their jeepney unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Apolinaria hopes to be more successful in business and dreams of having good health. She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

-Jeepneys are the most popular means of public transportation in the Philippines. They were originally made from US military jeeps left over from World War II and are known for their flamboyant decoration and crowded seating. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. They have become a ubiquitous symbol of Philippine culture. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of her jeepney unit.

loans.name: Eloisa

texts.en: Eloisa, 28 years of age, is married to a farmer and blessed with two children. She sells animals in their village and earns a net income of 4,000 to 5,000 PHP in this business. Her profits are usually spent on her family's daily expenditures, but due to insufficient funds to run her business she would like to take out a loan amounting to 20,000 PHP to purchase animals to sell, such as carabao and cows. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can improve her business and earn more income.

loans.use: To purchase animals to sell, such as carabao and cows.

loans.name: Yeimy Carolina

texts.es:
Ella es Yeimy, tiene 18 años, ella vive con la  madre y los dos hermanos, estudia cosmetología y estética integral en Campo alto, para ella estudiar es lo que la puede ayudar a sacar adelante a la familia, pues las condiciones en que vive no son muy agradables, ya que la madre es cabeza de hogar y no le puede dar todo a los hijos,  por este motivo Yeimy trabaja desde muy pequeña y se esfuerza mucho para poder reunir lo de la cuota y materiales para continuar estudiando. En este momento se encuentra trabajando en un restaurante en el cual se ha desempeñado como una gran persona y una buena trabajadora.

Ella se esfuerza mucho para cuidar lo que tiene, pues sabe que sin ello no puede culminar los estudios que es por lo cual ella ha hecho hasta lo imposible para no tener que dejarlo.  

La vida le enseño  que debe luchar por cumplir con los propósitos, sueña con culminar los estudios y así tener la propia estética y siempre continuar estudiando para encaminar una nueva meta cada día, gracias a la ayuda que le brinda Kiva le queda más cerca la meta para cumplir el sueño y ayudar a la madre y brindarle un mejor futuro a los hermanos.
texts.en:
This is Yeimy. She is 18 years old and lives with her mother and two siblings. She is studying cosmetology and comprehensive esthetics in Campo alto. For her, studying is what will help her move forward with her family, as the conditions in which she currently lives are not very nice. As her mother is the head of the household and cannot give everything to her children, Yeimy has worked since she was very young.
